content.rendered:
Call & Deliver: A New Service from NHS Tayside Charitable Foundation

At NHS Tayside Charitable Foundation, we understand how important it is to stay connected with loved ones and friends during their hospital stay. That’s why we are excited to introduce our new service, Call and Deliver, designed to bring comfort and happiness to patients at Ninewells Hospital.

What is Call and Deliver?

‘Call and Deliver’ is a convenient service that allows relatives and friends of patients to send gifts or essential items directly to the wards in Ninewells Hospital. Whether it’s a thoughtful gesture to brighten someone’s day or necessary items to make their stay more comfortable, we’re here to help bridge the gap between you and your loved one.

How does it work?

Using our easy process, you can:

  • Browse our Selection: Visit our dedicated Call and Deliver webpage to view a wide range of products available for delivery. From comforting treats to practical essentials, we have something for everyone.
  • Place Your Order: Once you’ve selected the items you wish to send, simply call our hotline. Our friendly team will assist you with your order, ensuring the right items are chosen for your loved one.
  • Make Your Payment: We’ll process your payment over the phone, making it quick and secure.
  • Delivery to the Ward: Our team of dedicated volunteers will then deliver your selected gifts or items to the specific ward where your relative is staying. You can feel confident that your gesture of care will reach them promptly.
Why Choose Call and Deliver?
  • Convenience: If you are unable to visit the hospital, we take care of the entire process for you.
  • Thoughtful Options: Our curated selection ensures you can choose the perfect gift or essential item based on your loved one’s needs.
  • Support Local Services: By using our service, you are helping to support the vital work of NHS Tayside and its charitable foundation.
Get Started Today!

Make a loved one’s hospital stay a little brighter with our Call and Deliver service.

For questions or further assistance, please don’t hesitate to reach out. Thank you for being a part of our community of care!

Orders can be taken over the phone Monday to Friday between 10.00-15.00.

Call us on 01382 633917 to order

Our Bundles

The Impact of our Partnership with Heart Space

NHST Covid Response for Staff and Patients

Tayside Healthcare Arts Trust (THAT) – Creative Engagement for Long-Term Conditions across Tayside 2021-22

Scottish Ballet Receives Funding from NHS TCF to Enhance Community Wellbeing in Perth and Kinross

NHS Tayside Charitable Foundation Trustees Visit -Perth Concert Hall-Dance For Parkinson’s

£10 Gift Sets

Arran Selections Discovery Box

Arran Selections Discovery Box

"Introducing a choice of 4 bestselling shower gels, you can try our Signature scent After the Rain, then enjoy ARRAN's best kept secret with the fruity freshness of Glenashdale.

If you prefer more of a spicy warmth you will enjoy sampling our Lochranza option or last but not least experience the mineral freshness of Machrie with the new ARRAN Mens Discovery Set.

Set Includes& After the Rain 30ml Shower Gel, Glenashdale & 30ml Shower Gel, Lochranza 30ml Shower Gel & Machrie 30ml Shower Gel"

Order for £10.00

Arran Lochranza Machrie Discovery Box

Arran Lochranza Machrie Discovery Box

Introduce loved ones - or yourself - to the spicy warmth of Lochranza or the mineral freshness of Machrie with the new ARRAN Mens Discovery Set. Includes Lochranza 30ml Shower Gel & 30ml Shave Gel and a Machrie 30ml Shower Gel & 30ml Shave Gel. In new and improved branded gift packaging, which is fully recyclable and more compact to reduce waste. 

Order for £10.00

Arran Kildonan Discovery Box

Arran Kildonan Discovery Box

"Introduce loved ones - or yourself - to ARRAN's new violet & orris leaf fragrance with our new Kildonan Discovery Set. Includes a 30ml Bath & Shower Gel, Shampoo, Body Lotion and Soap.

Kildonan is a blend of sweet and delicate violet warmed with the glow of velvety orris. Encapsulating the tranquillity of Kildonan basking in the late, summer sun. Escape to paradise with our new scent. In new and improved branded gift packaging, which is fully recyclable and more compact to reduce waste. "

Order for £10.00

Arran Glenashdale Discovery Box

Arran Glenashdale Discovery Box

"Introduce loved ones - or yourself - to the citrus notes of Glenashdale with ARRAN's Glenashdale Discovery Set. An awakening blend of grapefruit and green leaf, each Set includes a 30ml Bath & Shower Gel, Shampoo, Body Lotion and Soap.

Invigorate your senses with the energising zest of rasped lemons, oil of grapefruit, uplifted with the fresh, citrus notes of bergamot. In new and improved branded gift packaging, which is fully recyclable and more compact to reduce waste. "

Order for £10.00

Arran After the Rain Discovery Box

Arran After the Rain Discovery Box

ARRAN's signature scent, available in miniature. Introduce loved ones - or yourself - to their timeless blend of lime, rose and sandalwood with ARRAN’s After the Rain Discovery Set. Includes a 30ml Bath & Shower Gel, Shampoo, Body Lotion and Soap. In new and improved branded gift packaging, which is fully recyclable and more compact to reduce waste. 

Order for £10.00

Arran 03 Discovery Box

Arran 03 Discovery Box

"Introduce loved ones - or yourself - to the fresh, mineral richness of Seaweed and Sage with ARRAN's Apothecary Discovery Set. Includes 30ml Shampoo, Bath and Shower Gel, Body Lotion and Soap. In new and improved branded gift packaging, which is fully recyclable and more compact to reduce waste. 

Apothecary seaweed and sage is an invigorating fragrance infused with lemon, geranium, and orange formulated with mineral-rich seaweed extract. The seaweed and sage infused formulation has cleansing properties, providing prolonged skin hydration."

Order for £10.00

Cosy Gift Sets

Cosy Sloth Mug Gift Set

Cosy Sloth Mug Gift Set

This beautiful gift set includes the following items:
Bug Art sloth fine bone china mug
1 Borders biscuit mini pack*
2 Twinings everyday teabags
1 pair of cosy patterned ladies socks
** wool, polyester, cotton shoe size 4-7

The gift comes in a plain white gift bag with clear window.

*Borders mini pack biscuits come in various flavours, and we will always aim to supply what is pictured. Where this item is out of stock, an alternative Borders mini pack will be offered when you call for you to choose your preferred option.

**Patterned socks come in various colours and although we will always try to match the picture, this may not always be possible. The socks will always be of this style and quality, but pattern/colour may differ from picture.

Order for £14.50

Cosy Melts & Socks Gift Set

Cosy Melts & Socks Gift Set

This beautiful gift set includes the following items:
Oil/wax melt burner and one tealight (grey, black or beige available)
1 pack of natural soy wax cubes* 8pack x 70g
1 pair of cosy patterned ladies socks
** wool, polyester, cotton shoe size 4-7

The gift comes in a plain white gift bag with clear window.

*Wax cubes come in various scents, and we will always aim to supply what is pictured. Where this item is out of stock, an alternative scent will be offered when you call for you to choose your preferred option.

**Patterned socks come in various colours and although we will always try to match the picture, this may not always be possible. The socks will always be of this style and quality, but pattern/colour may differ from picture.

Order for £13.00

*Borders mini pack biscuits come in various flavours, and we will always aim to supply what is pictured. Where this item is out of stock, an alternative Borders mini pack will be offered when you call for you to choose your preferred option.

**Patterned socks come in various colours and although we will always try to match the picture, this may not always be possible. The socks will always be of this style and quality, but pattern/colour may differ from picture.

Order for £14.50

Cosy Bees Burner Gift Set

Cosy Bees Burner Gift Set

This beautiful gift set includes the following items:
Oil/wax melt burner and one tealight
1 pack of natural soy wax cubes* 8pack x 70g
1 pair of cosy patterned ladies socks
** wool, polyester, cotton shoe size 4-7

The gift comes in a plain white gift bag with clear window.

*Wax cubes come in various scents, and we will always aim to supply what is pictured. Where this item is out of stock, an alternative scent will be offered when you call for you to choose your preferred option.

**Patterned socks come in various colours and although we will always try to match the picture, this may not always be possible. The socks will always be of this style and quality, but pattern/colour may differ from picture.

Order for £15.00
